name: Arturoïds
description:
Introducing "Arturoïds" - a tribute to Atari's Asteroids arcade game. Named in honor of the talented artist who crafted the asteroids designs, this is my second game created using Cocos2D.

How to play

Press space to shoot bullets

Use the arrow keys to turn the spaceship

Destroy all the asteroids to win

Collect power-ups to repair the ship or deploy your energy shield
